answers.answer: im not a doctor but it doesnt seem like u have to worry about HIV. why would u think that of all things anyway? just curious...but if the cortizon worked for u then thats a good sign. HIV's initial symptoms are usually internal i.e (fever, flu like symptoms) long before it affects the skin, have u had persistant signs of this?...if not u should be ok, though it is always important to get tested for every std every so often to be safe. hope this helps.
I agree with Alexa.If you were a virgin 6 years ago, why were you even testing for HIV?AJ
I might add that you have been posting about concerns about STDs for a few months now.  Have you and your gf actually gone to test?  If you both have nothing, you can't spread anything.AJ

im sure we both have nothing because we both were virgins, maybe something from her mouth, but nothing. but my throth is soar and i have a white patch on my tongue and we have been kissing but se didnt get it also cortizone 10 made it alot better. but i still have a little thrush and my throath is soar that was why i was concerned about hiv which to me to is impossible to have it when i look back. i have an appoinment in june. quick question can thrush be a symptome of something else?
also the HIV test was because i was immigrating herewhich was negative meaning i didnt have anything

Sometimes thrush is just thrush.  It can be a symptom of diabetes, but if you are feeling fine otherwise, I wouldn't worry too much.And it makes sense now why you tested for HIV.  My guess is that you also tested for syphilis, too, when you were immigrating.Good luck!Aj

question: Hi everyone,Should i be worried about HIv since i took a test 6 years ago and never been with anyone except my girlfriend who is and was faithful to me for two years. We been having intercourse for two years and i noticed recently a white patch at the end of my tongue and also i have a really mild rash on my penis (on the head). WEll it goes back when she cut my shaft by her mouth. Please help. I been told is a mild bacterial infection but i used cortizon 10 and it seems way much better. please help.
title: HIV OR jus paranoid
